entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement [520000] Statement of cash flows, indirect method includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseInCashAndCashEquivalents of -207,529,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is -207,533,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -3. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseInCashAndCashEquivalents that should add to -207,529,000 are comprised of the following:
+ CashFlowsFromUsedInFinancingActivities -357,999,000 + CashFlowsFromUsedInInvestingActivities 14,724,000 + CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivities 135,742,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for [520000] Statement of cash flows, indirect method. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseInCashAndCashEquivalents Total Value : -207,529,000 Total period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -3 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/969500081CGAXB7YS433/2021-12-31/ESEF/FR/0/mercialys-2021-12-31-fr.zip/mercialys-2021-12-31-fr/reports/mercialys-2021-12-31-fr.xhtml 133102
